title: Google\Cloud\Speech\V1\SpeakerDiarizationConfig
name: SpeakerDiarizationConfig
description:
Config to enable speaker diarization.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.speech.v1.SpeakerDiarizationConfig

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.enable_speaker_diarization
params.description: If 'true', enables speaker detection for each recognized word in the top alternative of the recognition result using a speaker_tag provided in the WordInfo.

params.name: data.min_speaker_count
params.description: Minimum number of speakers in the conversation. This range gives you more flexibility by allowing the system to automatically determine the correct number of speakers. If not set, the default value is 2.

params.name: data.max_speaker_count
params.description: Maximum number of speakers in the conversation. This range gives you more flexibility by allowing the system to automatically determine the correct number of speakers. If not set, the default value is 6.

methods.description:
